page.title: 14FAMILY LIFE ON A FARM
page.content: When I get home from school I unpack my bag, then go upstairs to change out of my school clothes. I help my mum to make the tea. If she doesn't need my help I go outside and help my Dad. Sometimes I help feed the animals. We have 22 chickens, 6 calves, 2 sheep and 2 lambs. When my sister comes home from Queen Elizabeth Secondary School, Crediton, we have tea. After tea we all have to help with the washing up. When we have finished our jobs we either watch television or go outside. At 7.30 pm I have to get ready for bed. On school days I go to bed at 8 o'clock. At the weekend I am allowed to stay until 8.30. At the weekend we sometimes go into Exeter, or travel to a place like Torquay for the day.
